animeDescription: In a vast and tranquil field, a rowdy group of children rush in with bright intentions. Armed with an array of gardening tools, packets of soil, trays of flowers, and a lively attitude to boot, the group sets upon a barren patch to begin their project.  [Written by MAL Rewrite]
